traits.name: Indomitable (3/Day)
traits.desc: The warlord can reroll a saving throw it fails. It must use the new roll.

traits.name: Survivor
traits.desc: The warlord regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point but fewer hit points than half its hit point maximum.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The warlord makes two weapon attacks.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6+5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 80/320 it, one target. Hit: 6 (1d6+3) piercing damage.

legendary.name: Weapon Attack
legendary.desc: The warlord makes a weapon attack.

legendary.name: Command Ally
legendary.desc: The warlord targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. if the target can see and hear the warlord, the target can make one weapon attack as a reaction and gains advantage on the attack roll.

legendary.name: Frighten Foe (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.desc: The warlord targets one enemy it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear it, the target must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of warlord's next turn.
